settings.question: Why should I consult with a gemologist?
settings.answer: Our gemologists offer expert guidance on the quality, authenticity, and value of gemstones and diamonds to help you make informed choices.

settings.question: Are your diamonds conflict-free?
settings.answer: Yes, all our diamonds adhere to the Kimberley Process, ensuring they are ethically sourced and conflict-free.

settings.question: Can I work with a gemologist to design custom jewelry?
settings.answer: Absolutely! Our gemologists will assist you in choosing the perfect stones and creating a custom design tailored to your preferences.

settings.heading: Stienhardt is built on trust
settings.description: Weâ€™ve recruited an expert team of gemologists with independent certifications and years of experience. A gemologist has unparalleled expertise in assessing stones, but Stienhardt gemologists go a step further, channeling their knowledge to help you find the right stone.

settings.text: Reach out to our diamond specialists for a tailored assistance in choosing a stunning, GIA-certified lab-grown diamond. We guide you through every step of the process, helping you find the perfect diamond with confidence.

settings.title: No.1
settings.text: Share your diamond preferences or budget with our experts. They'll assist you in finding the perfect diamond.

settings.title: No. 2
settings.text: We'll review your specficiations and find a diamond that meets your criteria in our inventory.

settings.title: No. 3
settings.text: They thoroughly assess the stone you pick, regardless of who found it, highlighting any imperfections and sharing insights on how it matches your priorities.
If you are still not satisfied, Our experts can guide you through custom cutting or sourcing a stone that perfectly fits your needs.

settings.heading: Email Us To Connect with a Diamond Expert
